t: Meiji eyes Hello Panda brand expansion in US | Baking Business
s: October 29, 2024 - YORK, PA. — Meiji Co. Ltd. plans to invest $28 million in its North American subsidiary Meiji America Inc. to boost production capacity for the Hello Panda biscuit brand, including a new product called Hello Panda Pretzel.
